name: Neo Strategy Jam TD
description:
A tower defense game made with so much love, that I didn't have time left to fix up the graphics!

Summary
Instead of constructing towers, hire Heroes to stop the enemies from reaching your kingdom! Heroes have levels, skills and can pick up items. To attract heroes, you will need to have at least one of 5 facilities. Will you build your defense out of Rangers, Warriors, Wizards, Clerics or Merchants?

Start by spending your Lumber on the Facilities you want, then roll for your initial pick of Heroes. You get new options every round, and get 1 Lumber after clearing a wave to upgrade your Facilities.

Controls
WASD/Arrows/Middle Mouse Drag - Pan Camera
Left Mouse - Click/Select
Right Mouse - Cancel/Deselect
Hold Q - Speed Up
R - Restart
Esc - Quit
